languages.text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When an enemy under the effects of Executioner's toxin dies, all enemies in 2 cell radius receive a toxin {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}.

Whenever an enemy under the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} applied by the Executioner dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} ({uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}).

Whenever an enemy under the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} applied by the Executioner dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} ({uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}).

Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the Executioner dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo que sufre de una {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} infligida por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} muere, todos los enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor de ese enemigo reciben {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} niveles de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo que sufre de una {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} infligida por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} muere, todos los enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor de ese enemigo reciben {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} niveles de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を受けた敵が倒されるたび、その敵の半径2セル内にいるすべての敵は、{uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を受けた敵が倒されるたび、その敵の半径2セル内にいるすべての敵は、{uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: 当敌人死亡时，若该名敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}施加的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果，则周围2格内所有敌人都会被施加{uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}级{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当敌人死亡时，若该名敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}施加的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果，则周围2格内所有敌人都会被施加{uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3}级{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。

languages.text: Wenn ein vom {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} belegter Gegner stirbt, werden alle Gegner in einem Radius von 2 Zellen um diesen Gegner mit {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein vom {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} belegter Gegner stirbt, werden alle Gegner in einem Radius von 2 Zellen um diesen Gegner mit {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} belegt.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un ennemi souffrant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} meurt, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases subissent {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un ennemi souffrant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} meurt, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases subissent {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}.

languages.text: Когда противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}наложил{/g} отравление, погибает, все враги палача в радиусе 2 клеток от этого противника получают {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}наложил{/g} отравление, погибает, все враги палача в радиусе 2 клеток от этого противника получают {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}.

Когда противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}наложил{/g} отравление, погибает, все враги палача в радиусе 2 клеток от этого противника получают {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}'ın sebep olduğu {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksinden{/g} muzdarip olan bir düşman öldüğünde o düşmana en fazla 2 hücrelik uzaklıkta olan tüm düşmanlar, {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} seviye {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksine{/g} maruz kalırlar.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} dies, all enemies in a 2-cell radius around that enemy suffer {uip|Damage|128c956572394e86a932e89edbf544e3} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.
